instruction: Write a cover letter for a Software Engineer role at Google. Candidate has 5 years experience in backend development, skilled in Node.js and AWS.
output:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Software Engineer position at Google. With 5 years of experience in backend development, I’ve built scalable APIs and cloud-native systems using Node.js and AWS. My passion for clean architecture and performance optimization aligns with Google’s commitment to innovation.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
